meanings.sent1: Microbiologists use microscopes to study tiny living things.
meanings.sent2: Many microbiologists work in laboratories to research bacteria and viruses.
meanings.sent3: The microbiologists at the lab found a whole new world under the lens!
meanings.sent4: In the world of science, microbiologists are like detectives investigating the unseen.
meanings.sent5: The microbiologists' passion for the unseen world drives their research forward.

meanings.definition: Those who specialize in the study of microscopic organisms.
meanings.sent1: Microbiologists play a crucial role in understanding the smallest forms of life.
meanings.sent2: The team of microbiologists discovered a new species of tiny creatures in the soil.
meanings.sent3: When the microbiologists gathered for a meeting, they joked about being 'small world' experts.
meanings.sent4: The work of microbiologists sheds light on the hidden universe that surrounds us.
meanings.sent5: The microbiologists' dedication to uncovering the unseen is truly inspiring.
